title: Dr. Ajay Kumar Koli
text:
Hi there! Welcome to my profile page!
I am a data science educator. I am a first generation college graduate. My wife Dr. Kiran and I cofounded SARA Institue of Data Science, India. I am working to make data science education available to general public in India. I love to connect and chat with you. When I am not working, I like jogging and cooking.

title: Dr. Ajay Kumar Koli
text:
Education
University of Hyderabad | Hyderabad, Telangana.
PhD in Management Studies | Aug 2010 - Sept 2019
University of Wurzburgy | Wurzburg, Germany.
Research Stay | Jan 2014 - Feb 2014
Pondicherry Central University | Pondicherry, India. M.B.A. Tourism Studies | 2006 - 2008   Gold Medalist.
Jawaharlal Nehru University | New Delhi, India. B.A. Hons. Russian Language | 2003 - 2006
